Continue Abandon v. 1.0.0 Task Timer 	It is a simple application that help you to track down time wasted on something that described in task, which you can create. Track time you can in duration menu. 1.About app 2.How to use 	Click + button to add task 
	Pencil button allow you to edit task description and priority
	Trash can button allow delete task from list
	For start tracking task just hold on it, when task was done, hold one more time to stop tracking.
	Check duration of doing task in duration menu (second menu item in bottom menu).
	Application works in landscape mode, which allow edit task easier.
	Landscape mode also add one more field to track in duration menu, it is -Date- field which means date when task was launched. 3.Support 	If you find a bug or strange behaviour please give a clear description of your problem in a letter on our support email:
